predicate.note: Frames file for 'joust' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 36.1.

example.name: agentive
example.text: Amid a riot of jousting knights, circus clowns, gold-leaf centurions and creatures of the wild, lesser competitors will fall.

example.name: Don Quixote
example.text: John spent a lovely Saturday afternoon * jousting at windmills.
